segments.text: Yes . I sent in my resume at the end of last week . I'm applying for the accounts assistant position .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I have your name please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My name is Judy Liao . That's spelled L I A O .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright ... And did you have some specific questions about your application ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really . I was in the neighborhood , and I just wanted to stop in to see if you received my resume .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's no problem . Just give me a moment , and I can check.Judy Liao . Let's see ... Yes , here it is . Judy Liao . We have received your resume .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there anything else I can help you with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , maybe . The ad in the newspaper said you wanted the resume , a cover letter , and two letters of recommendation . I included those things in the envelope . Is there anything else I should send ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , that is all we need . If we have those things included , that is sufficient .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know when they will start setting up interviews for the job ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not really sure about that . But I know we are still receiving resumes.Maybe after a week or two they will start calling applicants .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Well , thank you very much for helping me . You have been very helpful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you have any further questions , you can call any time .
segments.speaker: S1
